Class PPMDataAccess

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PNMDataAccess
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PPMDataAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageDataAccess
public final class PPMDataAccess extends PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess
Provides functionality to read and write PPM image files in both ASCII (P3) and binary (P6) formats. Implements a Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance is used across the application. Extends PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess for shared functionality with PNM formats with maxvalue.
See Also:

  • ImageDataAccess

      protected long[][] readBinary(InputStream is) throws IOException
      Reads the binary (P6) PPM image data from the input stream and converts it into a 2D pixel array.
      Specified by:
      readBinary in class PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess
      Parameters:
      is - the InputStream to read the binary PPM data from
      Returns:
      a 2D array of pixels where each pixel contains combined RGB data
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the binary data

    • createRowTasks

      private List<Future<byte[]>> createRowTasks(long[][] pixels, ExecutorService executor, PNMDataAccess.RowGenerator generator)
      Creates tasks for generating pixel rows in parallel using the provided executor and row generator.
      Parameters:
      pixels - the 2D array of pixels to process
      executor - the ExecutorService to use for parallel task execution
      generator - a PNMDataAccess.RowGenerator to generate each row
      Returns:
      a List of Future objects representing the tasks for each row
